returns: True if user can spawn props, False if not.

SENT_Data_Structures.name: SENT_Data_Structures

prop.name: prop
prop.description: Library for creating and manipulating physics-less models AKA "Props".

params.name: mins
params.description: If not null, will define a lower bound of the ray's hull

params.name: maxs
params.description: If not null, will define a upper bound of the ray's hull

params.name: dir
params.description: The direction to project the cone

params.name: distance
params.description: The length to project the cone

params.name: radius
params.description: The cosine of angle of the cone. 1 makes a 0 cone, 0.707 makes approximately 90, 0 makes 180, and so on.

inPVS.name: inPVS
inPVS.description: Finds entities that are in the PVS (Potentially Visible Set). See: https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/PVS

returns: A table of the closest entities

params.name: furthest
params.description: Whether to have the further entities first

sortByClosest.name: sortByClosest
sortByClosest.description: Returns a sorted array of entities by how close they are to a point

closest.name: closest
closest.description: Finds the closest entity to a point

params.name: casesensitive
params.description: Boolean should the match be case sensitive?

params.name: exact
params.description: Boolean should the name match exactly

playersByName.name: playersByName
playersByName.description: Finds the first player with the given name

find.name: find
find.description: Find library. Finds entities in various shapes.

exists.name: exists
exists.description: Check if the given ConVar exists

hasFlag.name: hasFlag
hasFlag.description:
Returns true if a given FCVAR flag is set for this ConVar.
 https://wiki.facepunch.com/gmod/Enums/FCVAR

returns: The integer value or 0 if converting fails
getInt.name: getInt
getInt.description:
Returns value of the ConVar as a whole number.
 Floats values will be floored.

returns: The maximum value or nil if not specified
getMax.name: getMax
getMax.description: Returns the maximum value of the convar

getString.name: getString
getString.description: Returns value of the ConVar as a string.

getFlags.name: getFlags
getFlags.description:
Returns FCVAR flags of the given ConVar.
 https://wiki.facepunch.com/gmod/Enums/FCVAR

returns: The minimum value or nil if not specified
getMin.name: getMin
getMin.description: Returns the minimum value of the convar

getDefault.name: getDefault
getDefault.description: Returns default value of the ConVar

returns: The float value or 0 if converting fails
getFloat.name: getFloat
getFloat.description: Returns value of the ConVar as a floating-point number.

getBool.name: getBool
getBool.description:
Returns value of the ConVar as a boolean.
 True for numeric ConVars with the value of 1, false otherwise.

params.name: dest
params.description: The table you want the source table to merge with

params.name: source
params.description: The table you want to merge with the destination table

merge.name: merge
merge.description: Merges the contents of the second table with the content in the first one.

collapseKeyValue.name: collapseKeyValue
collapseKeyValue.description: Collapses a table with keyvalue structure

isSequential.name: isSequential
isSequential.description: Returns whether or not the table's keys are sequential.

params.name: tbl
params.description: The table to sort in descending order

sortDesc.name: sortDesc
sortDesc.description: Sorts a table in reverse order from table.sort

lowerKeyNames.name: lowerKeyNames
lowerKeyNames.description: Returns a copy of the input table with all string keys converted to be lowercase recursively.

keysFromValue.name: keysFromValue
keysFromValue.description: Returns a table of keys containing the supplied value.

params.name: member
params.description: The key used to identify the member

params.name: ascending
params.description: Optional, should be ascending? Defaults to false

sortByMember.name: sortByMember
sortByMember.description: Sorts a table by a named member.

returns: A deep copy of the original table
copy.name: copy
copy.description: Creates a deep copy and returns that copy. This function does NOT copy userdata, such as Vectors and Angles!

params.name: tbl
params.description: Table to insert value in to. If not supplied, will create a table

forceInsert.name: forceInsert
forceInsert.description: Inserts a value in to the given table even if the table is non-existent

params.name: val
params.description: Any value to return element after

findNext.name: findNext
findNext.description:
Returns the value positioned after the supplied value in a table. If it isn't found then the first element in the table is returned.
 (DEPRECATED! Iterate the table using ipairs or increment from the previous index using next(). Non-numerically indexed tables are not ordered)

findPrev.name: findPrev
findPrev.description:
Returns the value positioned before the supplied value in a table. If it isn't found then the last element in the table is returned.
 (DEPRECATED! Iterate the table using ipairs, storing the previous value and checking for the target). Non-numerically indexed tables are not ordered)

params.name: tbl
params.description: The table to get value of

getLastValue.name: getLastValue
getLastValue.description:
Returns the last value found in the given table. (DEPRECATED! Use the # operator instead)
 Non-numerically indexed tables are not ordered and do not have a last key

params.name: func
params.description: The function to run for each key and value

forEach.name: forEach
forEach.description:
Iterates for each key-value pair in the table, calling the function with the key and value of the pair. If the function returns anything, the loop is broken.
 (DEPRECATED! You should use pairs() instead)

returns: A reversed copy of the table
reverse.name: reverse
reverse.description: Returns a reversed copy of a sequential table. Any non-sequential and non-numeric keyvalue pairs will not be copied

empty.name: empty
empty.description: Removes all values from a table

returns: A random value from the table
The key associated with the random value
random.name: random
random.description: Returns a random value from the supplied table.

params.name: niceFormatting
params.description: Optional, adds new lines and tabs to the string. Defaults to false

toString.name: toString
toString.description: Converts a table into a string

returns: Returns true if the table has that value, false otherwise
hasValue.name: hasValue
hasValue.description: Checks if a table has a value. This function is very inefficient for large tables (O(n)).
